ps1.8:1.4: Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.5: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, sukhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.6: Anattani, bhikkhave, attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.7: Asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro saññāvipallāsā cittavipallāsā diṭṭhivipallāsā.
ps1.8:2.3: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.4: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.5: Anattani, bhikkhave, anattāti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.6: Asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.
ps1.8:2.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro nasaññāvipallāsā nacittavipallāsā nadiṭṭhivipallāsā”ti.
ps1.8:8.1: Ime cattāro vipallāsā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā, appahīnāti.
ps1.8:8.3: Anicce niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.4: Dukkhe sukhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.5: Anattani attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.6: Asubhe subhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.
ps1.8:8.8: Dvīsu vatthūsu dve vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā.
ps1.8:8.9: Catūsu vatthūsu aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnāti.
